7) Tan delta Measurement for Compensated Attenuator

Compensated attenuator are employed for the measurement of tan delta. When the circuit is compensated , the manual calculation is involved in determining the tan delta . The ratio of two voltages are measured and ratiometric measurement techniques is used to display this ratio.

This is a very simple app that can be used by a person having basic knowledge of English. This project mainly deals for the people who are away from family and do not know how to cook.
